description: Green Home Systems is looking for a talented, focused designer to help design solar systems. As a design engineer, you will work with us to create new proposals and render them based on all the necessary design skills to build a winning proposal. NO EXPERIENCE NECESSARY!!! Green Home Systems, The sun is the source. We are your provider.
responsibilities: Once here you will: Help an experienced, interdisciplinary team of makers, Analyze homeowners bill to design a solar system, Find creative solutions to submit winning proposals, Create high quality visual renders, Solve complex design challenges, Create 3-D models of homes with solar panels, Your designs will be installed on real homes.

qualifications.preferred: Above average computer skills, A passion for working in a growing industry, Good self management skills, Able to flourish while meeting deadlines, Experience self-guiding and leading projects, Excellent time management, An aptitude for following directions, Great communication and collaboration skills, Motivation, initiative, and attention to detail, An ability to work quickly.

skills: A passion for working in a growing industry
Able to flourish while meeting deadlines
Motivation, initiative, and attention to detail
